abort.already_exists: Record with same name already exists.
abort.empty auth data: Can not authorize on Binance API (empty api_key or api_secret)

user.description:
Come up with a unique name for the integration.

Specify the domain in which the account is registered, as well as data for connecting to the Binance API.

Connection data can be obtained in the profile settings ("API Management")
user.title: Main Settings

abort.yaml_not_supported:
YAML configuration is not supported.

Settings can only be changed via YAML.

init.description:
Come up with a unique name for the integration.

Specify the domain in which the account is registered, as well as data for connecting to the Binance API.

Connection data can be obtained in the profile settings ("API Management")
init.title: Main Settings

data.balances: Spot wallet balances to be monitored
